Package view_controller

Class ModifyAppointment

  • java.lang.Object
    • view_controller.ModifyAppointment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class ModifyAppointment
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    ModifyAppointment Class. This class is used to create a controller for the ModifyAppointmentScreen. It has methods that interact with the screen and database.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ModifyAppointment

        public ModifyAppointment()

    • Method Detail

      • sendData

        public void sendData​(Appointment appointment)
        This method is used to send data from the main screen for the selected appointment. This method contains a lambda expression for removing the appointment being modified from its list of appointments. This allows for the appointments list to stay up to date with a small amount of code. This helps to insure there are not appointments scheduled during the same time.
        Parameters:
        appointment - the appointment that was selected from the main screen.

      • cancelAdd

        public void cancelAdd​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method cancels modifying an appointment and returns to the main screen of the application. This method contains a lambda alert confirming the user wants to return to the main screen. This allows for an internal method to be run for clicking the OK button with a smaller amount of code.
        Parameters:
        event - the close button being clicked.

      • saveAppointment

        public void saveAppointment​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method is used to listen for the save button to be pressed and saves the modifications to the appointment and sends them to the database.
        Parameters:
        event - the save button being pressed
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • setDayAmount

        public void setDayAmount​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method sets the amount of days in each month for the combo boxes.
        Parameters:
        event - reads how many days to add for each month when a month is selected

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL location,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
        This method is used to initialize the scene at the start of modifying an appointment.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        location - the location of the screen
        resources - the resourceBundle used
